question:
Which of the following are MIKE sites in India?
  1. Chirang Ripu
  2. Dhang Patki
  3. Garo Hills
  4. Shivalik
Select the correct answer from the codes given below-
explanation:
There are a total of 10 MIKE sites in India which are
  • Chirang Ripu in Assam
  • Dhang Patki in Assam
  • Eastern Dooars in West Bengal
  • Deomali in Arunachal Pradesh
  • Garo hill in Meghalaya
  • Mayurbhanj in Odisha
  • Mysore in karanatka
  • Nilgiri in Tamil Nadu
  • Shivalik in Uttrakhand
  • Waynad in Kerala
